turns.content:
Formulate the following solution below in bullet points: 

I have experience dealing with the public in various capacities. I have worked as a Retail Associate at McDonald’s Corporation, where I collaborated with other employees to serve customers in a high-volume fast-paced environment. I exceeded high standards of customer service care by advertising more than 25 products through 100+ orders and transactions in front counter/ drive-through and communicated effectively to ensure a 100% customer satisfaction rate. I also have experience as a Security Guard, where I participated in over 100 security activities while successfully screening over 100 patrons using bag searches and ID verification. I removed over 20 unauthorized visitors and supervised youth during shifts, assisting educators as needed. I demonstrated quick response to potential crowd control issues and provided escorts for individuals as required. I also have experience in dealing with the public as an Administrative Assistant, where I answered 100+ incoming calls and scheduled appointments to appropriate personnel corresponding to clientele needs. My skills in understanding and responding to customer's needs and concerns, and providing guidance and advice, demonstrate my experience in dealing with the public on a first point person basis.

* Experience working as a Retail Associate at McDonald’s Corporation
* Collaborated with other employees to serve customers in a high-volume, fast-paced environment
* Exceeded high standards of customer service care by advertising products and communicating effectively to ensure customer satisfaction
* Experience as a Security Guard, where participated in over 100 security activities
* Successfully screened over 100 patrons using bag searches and ID verification
* Removed over 20 unauthorized visitors and supervised youth during shifts
* Demonstrated quick response to potential crowd control issues and provided escorts for individuals as required
* Experience as an Administrative Assistant, where answered 100+ incoming calls and scheduled appointments to appropriate personnel
* Strong skills in understanding and responding to customer's needs and concerns and providing guidance and advice
* Experience in dealing with the public on a first point person basis
